about_the_game:
IncrediMarble is an idle incremental construction game in which you build gigantic marble contraptions. With 30 unique pieces to choose from and more always being added, your imagination is the only limit! See what amazing marble worlds you can create and come back to earn more and more points... and build a larger and larger marble universe!

"This is a really good game. I’ve been wanting something like this for a long time" - Random anonymous player

"This game is so relaxing!" - Another random anonymous player

"It's the first time I've sold a game!" - Dave Kap, the sole developer of IncrediMarble

"WTF it just worked out of the box!?" Matias G commenting about the Linux port

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Knowing Linux, get something released between 15 and 5 years ago.
  • Processor: Does Linux even have their own processor?
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: I don't think Linux has graphics.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: I don't think Linux has sound either.
  • Additional Notes: Linux support was approved because 1 person said they could run the game, so good luck!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Does it matter? Apple forces you onto the latest anyway.
  • Processor: Intel? ARM? It all probably works.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A potato could run this.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Do Macs even have sound cards?
  • Additional Notes: Whatever you do, don't buy the App store version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP+1) or Windows 10
  • Processor: X86, x64 with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Probably anything released from 2012 or later.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any, I would think.
  • Additional Notes: It's a pretty simple game, you should be fine.
